Summary: Triangular ufo in conjunction with near silent pla
divs: Sighting DetailsA foul odor eminating from the above apartment was keeping me awakeI was facing my computer when I heard a whispering sound. I opened the door tosee what it was and a gray non fighter aircraftlarger than a fighter flew overmy two story apartment at an altitude such that if I were standing on the roof Iwould have been struck by the plane. It made no more than a whisper. I sat outunder a tree it was late at night at the lakeside XII apartment complex and Iheard jet aircraft and I saw in the sky a large aircraft high in the sky with awing formation like a B-52. A few minuetes later a dark blue black triangularshaped craft appeared to my right flying at very low altitude - as I looked fromthe stern it flashed lights at me in a manner pardon the comparison reminicentof Close Encounters of the Third Kind. Note which may be taken with skepticismfor the past few years I have been involuntary involved in what I suspect is aninformationdisinformation campaign involving MJ-12 and my status as a mindcontrolled intelligence operative drafted into the service if what I have beentold by telepathy is true of the US Navy at the rank of Ensign and MAJIC-12. Idid meet NSA director W.E. Odom prior to the active phase of the operation and Igraduated from Yale College in 1998. Thank You for Your Patience -- I realizethis sounds quite odd.
